room_title: Escape room "The Newsroom" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: We did the Newsroom with a group of seven friends and we got out with a little over a minute to spare. Our game master was great and the puzzles presented just the right amount of challenge. Can't wait to come back and do the other rooms!

room_title: Escape room "The Newsroom" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: A large group of us attempted to get out of the apartment. We were so very close but didn't succeed in 60 minutes. Great fun!

room_title: Escape room "The Newsroom" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: My group of 8 family members did the apartment but unfortunately, did not escape. The setup was great! Some clues were nice and easy, but some were extremely hard! I'd come back to do another room or even try it again!

room_title: Escape room "The Newsroom" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: had a super fun time with the family! totally worth the money, the rooms are super neat & very well set up!

room_title: Escape room "The Newsroom" by Escape the Room Pittsburgh in Pittsburgh
review: A fun thing to do with friends - even if you fail to escape - a humbling experience filled still with lots of laughing and a friendly staff who helps you not feel totally stupid
